devdoc.details: Mods can be used to distribute a percentage of payments or tickets to preconfigured beneficiaries.

params._terminalDirectory: A directory of a project's current Candybox terminal to receive payments in.

params._configuration: The configuration to get mods for.
params._projectId: The ID of the project to get mods for.

returns._0: An array of all mods for the project.

setPayoutMods(uint256,uint256,(bool,uint.details: Only the owner or operator of a project can make this call, or the current terminal of the project.

params._configuration: The configuration to set the mods to be active during.
params._projectId: The project to add a mod to.

setTicketMods(uint256,uint256,(bool,uint.details: Only the owner or operator of a project can make this call, or the current terminal of the project.

params._configuration: The configuration to set the mods to be active during.
params._projectId: The project to add a mod to.

params._configuration: The configuration to get mods for.
params._projectId: The ID of the project to get mods for.

returns._0: An array of all mods for the project.

payoutModsOf(uint256,uint256).notice: Get all payout mods for the specified project ID.

setPayoutMods(uint256,uint256,(bool,uint.notice: Adds a mod to the payout mods list.

setTicketMods(uint256,uint256,(bool,uint.notice: Adds a mod to the ticket mods list.

ticketModsOf(uint256,uint256).notice: Get all ticket mods for the specified project ID.
